Actions.Name: Get latest by country code or zone
Actions.Description: This endpoint retrieves the last known state of a country. It is also possible to get data for a specific zone, in case the country is divided by zones seen on app.electricitymap.org

Actions.Name: Get Available Zones
Actions.Description: A list of countries and zones by code (zone being the country is divided by zones seen on app.electricitymap.org)
